about_the_game:
This is a pixel art text-based adventure game.
Multiple branching options, multiple endings, and light puzzle-solving.

Shen Yi, a genius doctor returning from Germany, infiltrates a private county hospital.
In search of the truth behind the death of his half-sister.
Initially believing it was just the misconduct of the hospital's top management, the protagonist seeks revenge.
But he gets entangled in a larger conspiracy.
Academic fraud, organ trafficking, corruption among the powerful...
Shen Yi forms an alliance with young doctors in the hospital to challenge the mastermind of power.
But everything seems to be a cruel mental test for the pure-hearted new doctors, like an invisible net.
Hospital leaders involved in crime, teammates betraying like 'The Spy in the House of Love', a powerful web of interests...
Faced with innocent patients, is it to sacrifice their lives to complete revenge?
Or to risk saving them, putting oneself and friends in danger?
The entanglement of morality and desire, the closer to the truth, the more unattainable the ideal...

Did the sister commit suicide on her own?
Is there another mastermind behind it all?
Are all efforts contrary to the original self?
Is the truth completely opposite to what is known?

Facing the call of power, perhaps some people disregard life.
Enduring humiliation and no one cares, or one becomes a general at the cost of a thousand bones,
Doctor? Brother? Savior? Avenger?
Or always remain pure, willing to sacrifice everything...
Or step into the power stage, become the power holder and the beneficiary...

What kind of role will you play?
The English version will be released after the Chinese version.

name: A surgery Beyond The Heart
short_description: A death incident involving surgery, an intern without a heart. A medical scam spanning twenty years, a meticulously planned power game.
